timeline.bodyText: Perhaps another test class would be better than adding this section in comments??
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Should there be a test class per method being tested? I was just trying to add a quick visual guide for where certain tests for one method start vs another method.
replies.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: I thought the file was larger than it actually is. This should be fine.
replies.author: bamandel
